meanings.definition: A type of whale known for its large, bow-shaped head.
meanings.sent1: The bowheads gracefully swam through the ocean.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study bowheads to learn more about marine life.
meanings.sent3: The bowheads decided to have a race to see who was the fastest swimmer.

meanings.sent5: Children were amazed by the sheer size of the bowheads as they breached the surface.

meanings.sent1: We spotted a pod of bowheads during our whale watching tour.

meanings.sent3: The bowheads held a meeting to discuss their upcoming journey.
